history.content:
Dear Students,

We hope you enjoyed your Winter Break.

Some information about advising availability in Spring 2022:

All  department (EE/CS) advising will remain remote - via Zoom, Google Meet or by phone - indefinitely. We have resumed CS drop-in hours on Wednesdays from 2-4. See this page for the Zoom link.

The e-mail alias for L&S students is cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu  This alias goes to ALL advisors (CS and EECS) and it's a faster way to get in touch than emailing individual advisors, as some may be out of the office. EECS students can use eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu. This just reaches Heather, Gina and Kait.

Let us know if you have any questions.  And Cheers for 2022!

history.subject: From Advising:  Our availability in Spring 2022

history.content:
Dear Students,

We hope you enjoy your upcoming Winter Break.

Some information about advising availability over Winter Curtailment time:

CS and EECS Advising will not be accepting appointments from Dec 20th - Jan 7th.  There will still be email responses Dec 20th- Noon Dec 22, and also the week of Jan 3 -7.  The last virtual drop in advising for CS Fall 21 will be Dec 15th, then drop ins will return on Wed Jan 12th.  Everything will remain remote until further notice.

Remember our email is cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu  This alias goes to ALL advisors (CS and EECS) and it's a faster way to get in touch than emailing individual advisors, as some may be out of the office. EECS students may also use eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu. This just reaches Heather, Gina and Kait.

Let us know if you have any questions.  And Cheers for 2022!

history.subject: From Advising:  Our availability over Winter Break time

history.content:
Dear Students,

First a heart felt greeting of well wishes for Finals week.  You've got this!  And we hope you enjoy your upcoming Winter Break.

Some information about advising availability over Winter Curtailment time:

The EECS Dept will be closed from noon Dec 22 through Jan 2rd. Reopening Jan 3rd. CS and EECS Advising will not be accepting appointments from Dec 20th - Jan 7th.  There will still be email responses Dec 20th- Noon Dec 22, and also the week of Jan 3 -7.  The last virtual drop in advising for CS Fall 21 will be Dec 15th, then drop ins will return on Wed Jan 12th.  All will remain remote until further notice.

Remember our email is cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu  This alias goes to ALL advisors (CS and EECS) and it's a faster way to get in touch than emailing individual advisors, as some may be out of the office. EECS students may also use eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu. This just reaches Heather and Gina.

Let us know if you have any questions.  And Cheers for 2022!
